trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged.CollectionChanged"></xref> event.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs"></xref> class that describes a <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Reset"></xref> change.
The action that caused the event.
This must be set to <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Reset"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs"></xref> class that describes a multi-item change.
The action that caused the event.

This can be set to <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Reset"></xref>, <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Add"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Remove"></xref>.
The items that are affected by the change.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs"></xref> class that describes a one-item change.
The action that caused the event.

This can be set to <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Reset"></xref>, <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Add"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Remove"></xref>.
The item that is affected by the change.
If action is not Reset, Add, or Remove, or if action is Reset and changedItem is not null.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs"></xref> class that describes a multi-item <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Replace"></xref> change.
The action that caused the event.
This can only be set to <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Replace"></xref>.
The new items that are replacing the original items.
The original items that are replaced.
If action is not Replace.
If oldItems or newItems is null.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs"></xref> class that describes a multi-item change or a <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Reset"></xref> change.
The action that caused the event.

This can be set to <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Reset"></xref>, <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Add"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Remove"></xref>.
The items affected by the change.
The index where the change occurred.
If action is not Reset, Add, or Remove, if action is Reset and either changedItems is not null or startingIndex is not -1, or if action is Add or Remove and startingIndex is less than -1.
If action is Add or Remove and changedItems is null.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs"></xref> class that describes a one-item change.
The action that caused the event.

This can be set to <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Reset"></xref>, <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Add"></xref>, or <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Remove"></xref>.
The item that is affected by the change.
The index where the change occurred.
If action is not Reset, Add, or Remove, or if action is Reset and either changedItems is not null or index is not -1.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs"></xref> class that describes a one-item <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Replace"></xref> change.
The action that caused the event.
This can only be set to <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Replace"></xref>.
The new item that is replacing the original item.
The original item that is replaced.
If action is not Replace.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs"></xref> class that describes a multi-item <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Replace"></xref> change.
The action that caused the event.
This can only be set to <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Replace"></xref>.
The new items that are replacing the original items.
The original items that are replaced.
The index of the first item of the items that are being replaced.
If action is not Replace.
If oldItems or newItems is null.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs"></xref> class that describes a multi-item <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Move"></xref> change.
The action that caused the event.
This can only be set to <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Move"></xref>.
The items affected by the change.
The new index for the changed items.
The old index for the changed items.
If action is not Move or index is less than 0.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs"></xref> class that describes a one-item <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Move"></xref> change.
The action that caused the event.
This can only be set to <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Move"></xref>.
The item affected by the change.
The new index for the changed item.
The old index for the changed item.
If action is not Move or index is less than 0.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedEventArgs"></xref> class that describes a one-item <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Replace"></xref> change.
The action that caused the event.
This can be set to <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Replace"></xref>.
The new item that is replacing the original item.
The original item that is replaced.
The index of the item being replaced.
If action is not Replace.
Gets the action that caused the event.
A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedAction"></xref> value that describes the action that caused the event.
Gets the list of new items involved in the change.
The list of new items involved in the change.
Gets the index at which the change occurred.
The zero-based index at which the change occurred.
Gets the list of items affected by a <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Replace"></xref>, Remove, or Move action.
The list of items affected by a <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Replace"></xref>, Remove, or Move action.
Gets the index at which a <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Move"></xref>, Remove, or Replace action occurred.
The zero-based index at which a <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.NotifyCollectionChangedAction.Move"></xref>, Remove, or Replace action occurred.
